channel.title: Rexo pvp! 317 [PI] Need staff & players!
channel.description:
[b]Rexo pvp, a Project insanity based server. Need staff and players, great eco, medium range exp rate Come over and have a go on Rexo pvp![/b]

[b]HELP:[/b] If for any reason you need help, please feel free to contact me via: [b]Email:[/b][email]ToastGamerGuy@gmail.com[/email] [b]Skype:[/b]ToastyGamerGuy
[b]Our Links:[/b] REXO CLIENT (.zip) > [url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/a2fgy4twzyk2a2b/%3DREXO%20PVP%3D.zip?dl=0]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/a2fgy4twzyk2a2b/%3DREXO%20PVP%3D.zip?dl=0[/url] REXO WEBCLIENT > [url=http://www.rswebclients.com/client/REXO%20PVP]http://www.rswebclients.com/client/REXO%20PVP[/url] -The download client is recommended ;) [b]Enjoy :) [/b]
[b]NOTE:[/b] -The download client requires the latest version of java This can be obtained here > [url=http://java.com/en/download/index.jsp]http://java.com/en/download/index.jsp[/url] [b]Enjoy :) [/b]
[b]Features:[/b] -Working drops! -Great eco! -Tutorial island! -618 Npcs! -Working prayers! -Great training! -Dragon claws & torva! -Amazing PVP! -Minigames! -Duel Arena! -Pest Control! -Custom Godwars! -NO CUSTOM ITEMS! -Cheap prices! -Donator benefits! -Fast cash! -RS Combat exp rate! -Player titles! -Custom events! [b]And many more![/b]

Need staff and players, great eco, medium range exp rate
Come over and have a go on Rexo pvp!
